channel.title: [PI]How to make Npc's(Bankers) face a certain direction? [PI]
channel.description: So I wanna make my canafis bankers face the bank but I don't know how. I think it's in npchandler.java then into npc spawn but can someone help me out? Thanks!

item.title: [PI]How to make Npc's(Bankers) face a certain direction? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Badmanjelly34 Badmanjelly34
item.description:
@Badmanjelly34 wrote:

in the npc file look for the npc banker and after the id of the npc should be space 0 space 0 i think the first 2 zeros or first you change to which way you want him to face so lets say 9999 is south and 9998 is north you would put the digit in. if you dont understand this i will message you a full tutorial on it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to make Npc's(Bankers) face a certain direction? [PI]
